ygData.subject: Re: Robe
ygData.msgSnippet: Purely more mana.  I ve got about +130 extra mana with all my items.. and believe me, it doen st help regen.  the only thing that helps regen is the mana
ygData.messageBody:
Purely more mana. I've got about +130 extra mana with all my items.. and
believe me, it doen'st help regen. the only thing that helps regen is the
mana stone, which i'm not even sure exists in the final release, or the
bard's regen song, that they get at lvl 32 or 34 i think.

>From: Gregory Egan <gemd@...>
>
>Just bought the "senior apprentice" robe, with +1 mana. Does anyone know
>what this does? I mean does it give you more mana, or do you regenerate it
>faster? Thanks for any info.
>
>Greg (Kronan)
>
